original_title: 初音ミク マジカルミライ 2017
overview: The 2017 installment in Crypton Future Media's annual "Magical Mirai" concert series, this concert was held at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan. This concert was unique, as the set list varied depending on the day of each performance, resulting in three slightly different set lists for the event.
title: Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2017
